markdown:
<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Otari Gazetteer](/Articles.aspx?ID=35)</title>

**Source** [Pathfinder #163: Ruins of Gauntlight](/Sources.aspx?ID=71) pg. 64

Otari's residents know about their town's heroic history, but not its many connections to the Abomination Vaults. Learn the secrets of this seaside town!
name: Otari Gazetteer
